item.title: Starbucks Spent 22 Years On a Secret Weapon. It All Pays Off Tomorrow, Thanks to Neuroscience
item.description: Key to success? ‘All those warm, fuzzy feelings.’

item.title: A Columbia Professor Says These 3 Habits Will Make You Smarter
item.description: A few small daily changes can boost your brain in a big way.

item.title: What to Know About Visas For Foreign Truckers and the Politics of a Deadly Florida Crash
item.description: The federal government halts issuing work visas to immigrant commercial truck drivers, citing road safety concerns.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell Faces Fresh Challenges to Fed Independence Amid Potential Rate Cuts
item.description: Powell is worried about inflation and how Trump’s tariffs could potentially push it higher.

item.title: European Postal Services Suspend Shipment of Packages to US Over Tariffs
item.description: Many European shipping companies say they’re unable to guarantee shipments will arrive before the new rules are in place on Aug. 29.
